channel.title: Taverncast - Happy Hour in Your Head - Since 2005
channel.description: Order a beer, pull up a seat and join your friends at Taverncast for our patented un-scripted roundtable discussions, covering a wide range of topics with a unique wit and inviting style - all blended together, it's Happy Hour in Your Head!

image.title: Taverncast - Happy Hour in Your Head - Since 2005

channel.itunes:subtitle: Beer - Talk - Fun.  It's Happy Hour in Your Head!
channel.itunes:summary: Order a beer, pull up a seat and join your friends at Taverncast for our patented un-scripted roundtable discussions, covering a wide range of topics with a unique wit and inviting style - all blended together, it's Happy Hour in Your Head!
channel.itunes:author: Bryce Erwin, Bill Ticknor, Michelle O'Neill, Mike Monan, Aric Watson, Jennifer Albrecht, Lauren Hoban and Derek Chew

items.title: Taverncast 62 - Temporal Anomaly
items.description: Taverncast tosses around the age old topic: time travel!  Where would you go?  Why would you go? Also, Bryce has customer service issues, and Mike buys a dog.
items.author: Taverncast
